page.title: 04FARM MACHINERY & STEADINGS
page.content: {Hermisgarth}consists of{284 acres}of land with{12 farm steadings.}There are 2{tied byres,}2{cubicle byres}(which are self-feeding), a{slatted floor {byre}& a{sloping floor byre.}There are 3{silage pits,}a{barn,}an{implement {shed,}a{general store}& a{slurry tank. Mr.Muir's{machinery}includes 6{Massey {Ferguson tractors}(two 75 hp, two 65 hp, one 48 hp & one 37 hp), 2{ploughs (one 14" wide four-furrow & one 11" wide three-furrow), a{combine {harvester,}2{forage harvesters}(one precision chop & one double chop), a {baler,}a{hay tedder,}a{slurry spreader & a{barrel dung spreader,}2{manure {spreaders}(one lift & one trailed), a {tattie planter,}a{crop sprayer,}a {ditcher-digger,}a{fork lift,}6 {trailers,}a{cement mixer, mowers}& {land rollers.}Some of this machinery is{shared}with the other Burness farms
